post.author: aphexjh
post.body: Does anyone else think the radio station level is amazing? It seems mor polished than many other levels/areas.

post.author: Gzegzolka
post.body: I do not know, sure environment is good and variety - streets, some museum, radio station interior and roofs. I like most part in this level when main objective is done and everything start to burn.

post.author: aphexjh
post.body:
I like the rooftops in this part also. The view looking down is amazing, also the way the layout of the level changes when everything starts burning is pretty cool. The amount of detail is surprising.
It looks like Dishonored has some awesome rooftops, looking forward to that.
